particular.translation[0].definitions[0]: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other
In this particular case, no one else was involved.
Most students choose one particular area for research.
particular.translation[0].definitions[1]: You should pay particular attention to spelling.
For no particular reason, he quit the job.
Of particular concern is the rising cost of transportation.
